name: Heartreasure
description:
"Heartreasure" is the very charming and simple puzzle game!

All you have to do is only searching heart images that are hidden in the picture and click them.

You can scroll by clicking and dragging.

If you want to find even more heart images, you have to achieve the missions that are shown when you click the colored hearts. If you success to achieve them, you will open the gates to the new areas for the further treasure hunting.

Find all the 30 heart images that are hidden in the picture, if you can!

Team Heartreasure: asaha, mamiko, nettaigyo
